t: WHAT’S NEXT FOR JOSEPH ABBOUD? - MR Magazine
s: February 13, 2020 - Shortly after Tailored Brands’ sale of the Joseph Abboud trademarks to WHP Global for $115 million, MR sat down with the celebrated designer in his beautiful Bedford, New York showroom. For the second time in his career, Abboud is separated from the successful namesake brand that he diligently ...

Joseph Abboud is a renowned American menswear brand, renowned for its classic tailoring and timeless style. Its signature pieces are crafted with quality fabrics and attention to detail, creating timeless pieces that will last for years.

Joseph Abboud glasses. The Joseph Abboud brand is the sophisticated, enlightened design alternative to traditional lifestyle brands, existing to reflect and express the confidence of its discerning core customer.
